product_name: Montrail Bison LLC Buffalo Chili with Beans
long_description: With the Montrail Bison LLC Buffalo Chili with Beans, you'll savor chunky, fully-cooked 100% buffalo chili with kidney beans. It's easy to heat and serve- simply boil in the bag, open and enjoy. Great for hiking and camping, over 1 lb. of bison meat provides superior nutrition.
short_description: With the Montrail Bison LLC Buffalo Chili with Beans, you'll savor chunky, fully-cooked 100% buffalo chili with kidney beans. It's easy to heat and serve- simply boil in the bag, open and enjoy.
